科学家发现脂肪储存的主调节基因我们都知道，考虑到影响体重的因素无数，体重增加和体重减轻并不像“卡路里摄入、卡路里消耗”那么简单。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231127/Scientists-discover-master-regulator-gene-for-fat-storage.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231127/Scientists-discover-master-regulator-gene-for-fat-storage.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=5a53705b-00ac-432f-b588-3c8eaf0c587e Mon, 27 Nov 2023 07:11:21 -0500 Scientists discover master regulator gene for fat storage

研究表明，与其他疫苗相比，辉瑞二价 COVID-19 加强疫苗对老年人预防中风风险更安全加强注射者发生缺血性中风 (IS) 的相对风险。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231127/Study-reveals-Pfizer-bivalent-COVID-19-booster-safer-for-seniors-against-中风-risk-compared-to-other-vaccines。 ASPX https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231127/Study-reveals-Pfizer-bivalent-COVID-19-booster-safer-for-seniors-against-中风-risk-compared-to-other-vaccines。 aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=2fa0ee39-fad6-469a-9d29-1bc0aba6ba82 Mon, 27 Nov 2023 06:17:00 -0500 Study reveals Pfizer bivalent COVID-19 booster safer for seniors against stroke risk compared to other vaccines
许多自身免疫性疾病患者因诊断、费用、护理不周而苦苦挣扎经过多年的疲惫不堪，贝丝·范奥登 (Beth VanOrden) 终于在 2016 年认为自己的问题找到了答案，当时她被诊断出患有桥本氏病（一种自身免疫性疾病）。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231127/Many-autoimmune-disease-病人-struggle-with-diagnosis-costs-inattentive-care.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231127/Many-autoimmune-disease-病人-struggle-with-diagnosis-costs-inattentive-care.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=9b073cde-646a-4615-9004-f4bde591ef65 Mon, 27 Nov 2023 06:03:12 -0500 Many autoimmune disease patients struggle with diagnosis, costs, inattentive care

New group plays fast and loose to make points
新研究表明螺旋藻和高强度训练组合可减少男性肥胖并发症高强度间歇训练 (HIIT) 与螺旋藻补充剂相结合可降低心脏代谢疾病风险。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231127/New-study-shows-Spirulina-and-high-intensity-training-combo-reduces-obesity-complications-in-men.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231127/New-study-shows-Spirulina-and-high-intensity-training-combo-reduces-obesity-complications-in-men.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=a393631a-29ad-4b4e-a029-8541fcb5c61b Mon, 27 Nov 2023 05:26:00 -0500 New study shows Spirulina and high-intensity training combo reduces obesity complications in men

新进化理论提出，发酵食品可能促进了人类大脑的生长《通讯生物学》评论表明，食物的外部发酵可能在原始人类大脑的扩张中发挥了关键作用。 “外部发酵假说”认为，早期人类在外部发酵食物的做法有助于大脑生长和肠道缩小，为人类进化和饮食习惯提供了新的视角。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231126/Fermented-foods-may-have-fueled- human-brain-growth-new-evolutionary-theory-proposes.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231126/Fermented-foods-may-have-fueled- human-brain-growth-new-evolutionary-theory-proposes.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=f4bb9629-9840-4e1f-8a44-3761e080bf2e Sun, 26 Nov 2023 22:53:00 -0500 Fermented foods may have fueled human brain growth, new evolutionary theory proposes
研究发现吸食大麻与其他物质使用增加有关简短的交流文件探讨了大麻电子烟与其他物质的使用之间的联系，将大麻电子烟使用者与不电子烟大麻使用者进行了比较。研究表明，大麻电子烟使用者更有可能使用酒精、烟草和非法药物等其他物质，尤其是在年轻人中。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231126/Cannabis-vaping-linked-to-increased-use-of-other-substances-study-finds.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231126/Cannabis-vaping-linked-to-increased-use-of-other-substances-study-finds.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=b2e0d17b-737b-4343-9f72-dc1e18e99a2a Sun, 26 Nov 2023 22:36:00 -0500 Cannabis vaping linked to increased use of other substances, study finds
